beneficial.reason: A single serving contains only 100 calories, which can be beneficial for weight management if consumed as part of a balanced diet.
Provides 4% of the daily value of potassium, an essential mineral for maintaining healthy blood pressure.

concerns.reason: Contains 160mg of sodium per serving (approximately 7% of the recommended daily intake).  High sodium intake can contribute to high blood pressure and other cardiovascular issues.
concerns.healthRisk: Increased risk of hypertension and cardiovascular problems
concerns.mitigation: Consume in very small portions and/or choose lower-sodium alternatives.

concerns.reason: Contains added sugars from sugar and tapioca maltodextrin.  Regular consumption of added sugars can contribute to weight gain, insulin resistance, and increased risk of chronic diseases.
concerns.healthRisk: Weight gain, insulin resistance, increased risk of chronic diseases
concerns.mitigation: Limit consumption and choose unsweetened snacks.

concerns.reason: Contains tapioca maltodextrin, a highly processed carbohydrate that can lead to blood sugar spikes and contribute to weight gain.
concerns.mitigation: Limit consumption and choose whole-grain snacks.

concerns.reason: Contains potatoes, a common allergen.  Individuals with potato allergies should strictly avoid this product.
concerns.healthRisk: Allergic reaction (ranging from mild to severe)
concerns.mitigation: Avoid completely if allergic to potatoes.

portionGuidance.recommendedServing: A maximum of 5-7 chips (approximately 1/4 of the bag)
portionGuidance.reasoning: Due to the high sodium and added sugar content, this snack should be consumed sparingly.  Larger portions or frequent consumption could negatively impact health.

alternativeSuggestions.reason: A lower-calorie, lower-sodium, and lower-sugar alternative snack.
Provides more nutrients and fiber than potato chips.

keyWarnings: High sodium content may exacerbate hypertension.
Added sugars can contribute to weight gain and other health problems.
Contains potatoes â€“ avoid if allergic.
Consult your doctor or registered dietitian before incorporating this snack into your diet, especially given your undefined dietary restrictions.
result.medicalDisclaimer: This analysis is for informational purposes only and does not constitute medical advice.  Always consult with your healthcare provider or a registered dietitian before making any dietary changes, especially if you have pre-existing health conditions or are taking medications.
